Rafforty:
You can combine each soul with the accessories of Freya, Queen Ant, Orfen, Antharas, and Valakas to create an item of even greater power! But--there's always a but--if you want me to combine these, the item that you possess will disappear, poof! And you'll receive a new item in return. And, if it's already enchanted, the existing enchant value will also disappear.
If you still want to proceed, I'm happy to bestow the souls and give you a more powerful item in exchange.
